message: Let's split the money. I believe a 60/40 split is fair considering the inflation disadvantage I have.
Considering the inflation, I think 55/45 is a fairer split.
Bob, the value of your potential gains is decreasing faster than mine. I'm offering you 35 which is a better deal than you'll likely get in further rounds.
Even with inflation, I think I deserve a bigger share. 52/48 is my final offer.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  The longer this goes on the less you get. Take 30 now before it's worth even less!
